name: SUPERFLAT 2600
description:
SUPERFLAT is a demake of SUPERHOT, made for a UWE Commercial Games Development course. Created by Anna Summerton, Ben Sharp, Cameron Bell, Kirsten Wotherspoon, Conrad Wilson and Jacob Woodman.

Time moves when you do, used WASD to shoot and SPACE to fire!

This game has no further development planned, but still leave feedback below, it will be read and appreciated!

https://forms.gle/yKh3VqDG17oid3ow6
